_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:57:04 using v2.1
title: How has life expectancy changed by gender?
analysis_commentary: The life expectancy of both genders has been increasing over time. Though we often expect women to live longer than men, the gap between the genders has, been decreasing. In 1981, the life expectancy of females was six years higher than males; in 2011, this has decreased to four years.
data_source: Office for National Statistics, Health Data 2013
